title: Salesforce
description: Salesforce Test for Business Development team based on the 1pager on wiki

answers.body: Choose a product from the list, use quantity to inform how many months developer will be needed, use engagement to mark if PM/QA will be fully engaged in the project or less (30%, 50% of the time), review the sales price, fill the date (that developer can start on), additional notes can be added to line description

Choose a product from the list, use quantity to inform how many months developer will be needed, use engagement to mark the number of developers needed, review the sales price, fill the date (that developer can start on), additional notes can be added to line description

answers.body: Leads are automatically assigned to the Inbound Queue Owner whenever new lead is created
Lead Master segments lead, choses a Lead Owner from Inbound Team Members and passes BD representatives all info needed
All created leads go to the Inbound Lead Queue. All queue members are notified about a new lead and they can pick up a lead by assigning it to themselves.
Leads are assigned first to Lead Segmentation Queue - Lead Master segments lead and assigns it to Inbound Leads Queue, lead owner is chosen from active queue members
Leads are automatically assigned to the Inbound Queue Owner whenever new lead is created
Lead Master segments lead, choses a Lead Owner from Inbound Team Members and passes BD representatives all info needed
All created leads go to the Inbound Lead Queue. All queue members are notified about a new lead and they can pick up a lead by assigning it to themselves.
Leads are assigned first to Lead Segmentation Queue - Lead Master segments lead and assigns it to Inbound Leads Queue, lead owner is chosen from active queue members

GDPR annex, General (law and jurisdiction), MSA

Subcontractors, General (law and jurisdiction, marketing consent

answers.body: Change the stage to Negotiation/Review or mark the Request Talent checkbox, both will work
Change the stage to Negotiation/Review
Mark the Request Talent checkbox
Ask Talent team (PMO) to assign talent

published_attributes.title: How to request talent to your project?

answers.body: Change the stage to Negotiation/Review or mark the Request Talent checkbox, both will work
Change the stage to Negotiation/Review
Mark the Request Talent checkbox
Ask Talent team (PMO) to assign talent

draft_attributes.title: How to request talent to your project?

answers.body: Close the opp and ask on #bd-account managers slack channel who can take care of this account
Close the opp ad won and Account Manager will be assigned automatically.
Contact AM Team Manager who will assign Account Manager to the opp.
Same as other products, add account manager as a product to your opp and mark Request Talent checkbox

published_attributes.title: I want Account Manager to be assigned to my opp. What should I do?

answers.body: Close the opp and ask on #bd-account managers slack channel who can take care of this account
Close the opp ad won and Account Manager will be assigned automatically.
Contact AM Team Manager who will assign Account Manager to the opp.
Same as other products, add account manager as a product to your opp and mark Request Talent checkbox

draft_attributes.title: I want Account Manager to be assigned to my opp. What should I do?

answers.body: You can just change the Opportunity Currency field if there are no products in the Opp.
Delete Opportunity and create a new one with a correct currency if there are products without talent assigned yet.
Contact SalesOps - if there are products with talent already assigned
All of the above

published_attributes.title: You can’t change the opportunity currency. What can you do?

answers.body: You can just change the Opportunity Currency field if there are no products in the Opp.
Delete Opportunity and create a new one with a correct currency if there are products without talent assigned yet.
Contact SalesOps - if there are products with talent already assigned
All of the above

draft_attributes.title: You can’t change the opportunity currency. What can you do?

answers.body: Outreach potential, reason opportunity lost and additional closed-lost notes are not filled.
There is no products in the opp
Opportunity is not matched with a contact
Salesforce bug occured, you need to contact Sales Operations

published_attributes.title: Unfortunately, a deal with a Client is off and we need to close the opportunity as lost. While changing the stage, an error occurred. What might be the cause?

answers.body: Outreach potential, reason opportunity lost and additional closed-lost notes are not filled.
There is no products in the opp
Opportunity is not matched with a contact
Salesforce bug occured, you need to contact Sales Operations

draft_attributes.title: Unfortunately, a deal with a Client is off and we need to close the opportunity as lost. While changing the stage, an error occurred. What might be the cause?

answers.body: Field won analysis (why client decided to work with us) is not filled.
There is no contract number, active contract must be linked with an opp to close it.
Talent is not assigned to the opportunity yet.
Billing data is not filled on the account.

published_attributes.title: Congrats, you’ve won the opportunity! You’re trying to change the opportunity stage but error occurs. What might be a reason for that?

answers.body: Field won analysis (why client decided to work with us) is not filled.
There is no contract number, active contract must be linked with an opp to close it.
Talent is not assigned to the opportunity yet.
Billing data is not filled on the account.

draft_attributes.title: Congrats, you’ve won the opportunity! You’re trying to change the opportunity stage but error occurs. What might be a reason for that?

answers.body: To download data from an external source and see if there are any contact connections between Netguru and this lead/account
To synchronize Gmail with Salesforce
To match a record with external database, pull the data into Salesforce, use it for a customer segmentation
To get help from Crunchbase specialists

To synchronize Gmail with Salesforce
To match a record with external database, pull the data into Salesforce, use it for a customer segmentation
To get help from Crunchbase specialists

answers.body: Log it same way as qualification call
Nothing, there is no need to log it, you’ve already logged the first one
You log a call as a task - from the account view, quick action menu or Cirrus Insight/Hubspot gmail plugin
Open the first call logged and add the information from a second call

answers.body: Add a contract note with discount details
Add an invoice adjustment type “Inbound - contract level” to the project, fill the start/end date and details
Inform a finance team that there is a discount so they can mark it on their own
Distract the discounted value from the opportunity amount

answers.body: Create opportunity and check the checkbox “more information needed”
Mark “more info needed” in no-opp reason field on the call log, set up another call and create an opp when you’ll get more information
Create pre-opportunity and add information and products later
Estimate on your own what will the project contain, create and opportunity, add products and change it later if there is a need

answers.body: On the opportunity - “Notes” field
On the account - Details tab, sections “NDA” and “MSA”
On the project - “Contracts” section

published_attributes.title: Congrats! You signed the contracts and won an opportunity! Time to mark in Salesforce if there were any contract changes. Where can you do it?

On the account - Details tab, sections “NDA” and “MSA”
On the project - “Contracts” section

draft_attributes.title: Congrats! You signed the contracts and won an opportunity! Time to mark in Salesforce if there were any contract changes. Where can you do it?

answers.body: Delete lead / contact from the system
Check the checkbox “email opt out” on Lead object or “Email opt out” and “do not contact” checkbox on Contact object
Edit the name of the contact, add “Don’t contact” before the name and surname
Deactivate the contact

published_attributes.title: How to mark in Salesforce when one of your contacts no longer wants to receive any emails from Netguru?

answers.body: Delete lead / contact from the system
Check the checkbox “email opt out” on Lead object or “Email opt out” and “do not contact” checkbox on Contact object
Edit the name of the contact, add “Don’t contact” before the name and surname
Deactivate the contact
